title: Stanning BTS: It’s Comeback Season — “Neva Play,” Muse, I Am Still, and More
description: Hosts Kayla and Bethany return to the podcast after hiatus to catch up on all the latest BTS happenings. Stanning BTS: It’s Comeback Season — “Neva Play,” Muse, I Am Still, and More Consequence Staff
author: Consequence Staff
excerpt: Stanning BTS returns with hosts Kayla and Bethany finally back from hiatus to catch up on everything from "Neva Play" to Are You Sure?! to Muse.
text: Listen via Apple Podcasts | Spotify | Amazon Music | More Platforms Unlike the still-serving BTS members, Kayla and Bethany of  Stanning BTS are officially returning from hiatus. After a season marked by personal change — breakups, the birth of a new child, and more — the duo returns to the mic. Listen above or via your favorite podcast provider. There’s plenty to discuss given all that’s happened since Stanning BTS took a break. On this episode, Kayla and Bethany do their best to unpack all the recent events, from RM’s appearance on Megan Thee Stallion’s “Neva Play”  to Jimin’s Muse, from Jin’s personal verions of Run! BTS dubbed Run Jin to Jimin and Jungkook’s travel show series Are You Sure?! (now available on Disney+!). Even with all that, they still find time to talk about Jungkook’s recent movie I Am Still, and much more. Listen to Kayla and Bethany make their grand return and cover all this — plus update on their personal lives! — in the latest episode of Stanning BTS above or wherever you get your podcasts. ARMY faithful can also pick up the Stanning BTS T-shirt, now on sale at the Consequence Shop — available in two colors! Then, don’t forget to check out all the Consequence Podcast Network series.
html:
Listen via Apple Podcasts | Spotify | Amazon Music | More Platforms

Unlike the still-serving BTS members, Kayla and Bethany of  Stanning BTS are officially returning from hiatus. After a season marked by personal change — breakups, the birth of a new child, and more — the duo returns to the mic. Listen above or via your favorite podcast provider.

There’s plenty to discuss given all that’s happened since Stanning BTS took a break. On this episode, Kayla and Bethany do their best to unpack all the recent events, from RM’s appearance on Megan Thee Stallion’s “Neva Play”  to Jimin’s Muse, from Jin’s personal verions of Run! BTS dubbed Run Jin to Jimin and Jungkook’s travel show series Are You Sure?! (now available on Disney+!). Even with all that, they still find time to talk about Jungkook’s recent movie I Am Still, and much more.

Listen to Kayla and Bethany make their grand return and cover all this — plus update on their personal lives! — in the latest episode of Stanning BTS above or wherever you get your podcasts. ARMY faithful can also pick up the Stanning BTS T-shirt, now on sale at the Consequence Shop — available in two colors! Then, don’t forget to check out all the Consequence Podcast Network series.
